price: 185. Waxay yidhaahdeen: Waxaad tahay oo keliya mid ka mid ah kuwa sixran12.
footnotes: 12. Waa haddii loo akhriyo “ minal mussaxariin” waxaa sidoo kale loo akhiryaa akhrin kale “ minal mussaxiriin” markaas mancaha waa kuwa wax sixra.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
